projects.title: Clock
projects.description: The International Clock provides the time of many cities ( 95% of cities ) in the GMT timezone.

projects.title: CoinFlip
projects.description: This provides a fair way to choose between heads and tails when you don't have a coin!

projects.title: Color Picker
projects.description: Customized color picker with many more options than the default one

projects.title: Currency Convertor
projects.description: This currency tool helps you in converting currencies to another, most of the currencies are supported

projects.title: Dice Roll
projects.description: This simple tool rolls two die with random numbers from 1 - 6

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: Helps you build a custom strong password!

projects.title: Random Choice Picker
projects.description: Picks a random choice from the list of choices you enter.

projects.title: Temperature Convertor
projects.description: This basic tool helps you in converting celsius to fahrenheit or the vise-versa.

projects.title: Text Manipulation
projects.description: This is a very useful tool for manipulating text cases to uppercase, lowercase, etc.

projects.title: TicTacToe
projects.description: Not a tool, this is a game played by many, it takes skill, go on, play!

projects.title: Weather Reporter
projects.description: Advanced weather reported for cities, type in the name of a city, press get weather, and there you go!

projects.title: Typing Test
projects.description: A simple typing test with over 50+ random paragraphs and sentences, test your typing speed!

projects.title: English Dictionary
projects.description: A simple english dictionary which gives the meaning and an example of the given word.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: A simple QR Code generator which generates custom QR Codes according to the entered value.

projects.title: Text To Speech
projects.description: An advanced tool with voice options which converts your text to speech with just a click of a button

projects.title: Country Information
projects.description: This tool provides you basic information of countries like their continent, population, capital, etc.

projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: This tool lets you make notes! You can update them, delete them, and create new ones...

projects.title: Language Translator
projects.description: A simple language translator tool with most languages

projects.title: QR-Code Reader
projects.description: A simple QR Code reader where you can upload QR Codes and it shows you the QR's content

projects.title: Random Number Generator
projects.description: this project generates a random number within the given range of minimum and maximum numbers.

projects.title: Live Character Counter
projects.description: A live character count with included word and no-spaces character counter.

projects.title: Password Strength Checker
projects.description: An advanced tool to check if your password is good to use or not

projects.title: Weight Convertor
projects.description: A tool which helps convert kilograms, pounds and ounces to the other units, enter in one, and get all the units values

projects.title: Code Notes
projects.description: Here you can save your code (any language), just like notes, but for code. Save as much code as you want
